headline: Is GE HealthCare Still Attractive After Its Recent Share Price Climb and AI Momentum?
summary: Wondering if GE HealthCare Technologies is actually good value at today’s price, or if the recent enthusiasm has already been priced in? Let us break down what the market might be missing. GE HealthCare’s share price has climbed to around $86.05, rising 4.3% over the last week and 17.2% in the last month, while still only up 9.8% year to date and 5.6% over the past year, after a strong 44.1% gain over three years. Recent headlines have focused on GE HealthCare’s position in advanced imaging...
